February 1 2018 CAS stated that the sanctions against 28 Russian athletes, including Olga Fatkulina, were annulled and their individual results achieved in Sochi 2014 reinstated.","42":null,"43":"Women's 500 m - Speed Skating - Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced in pairs on separate tracks (the inner and outer lanes) on a 400 m oval rink. Skaters switched lanes after the first half of the race in order to skate an equal distance. The 500 m distance was skated twice on the same day and the olympic gold medal winner was the athlete with the best total time for the two races  Event facts: Women's 500 m competition was held at the Adler Arena and 35 athletes participated in the event.","44":null,"45":"These results for Women's 500 m - Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","46":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Women's 500 m 2014","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Lee Sanghwa","6":"Olga Fatkulina","7":"Margot Boer","8":"Zhang Hong","9":"Nao Kodaira","10":"Jenny Wolf","11":"Wang Beixing","12":"Heather Richardson","13":"Maki Tsuji","14":"Karolina Erbanova","15":"Laurine van Riessen","16":"Christine Nesbitt","17":"Brittany Bowe","18":"Miyako Sumiyoshi","19":"Lauren Cholewinski","20":"Lotte van Beek","21":"Yekaterina Malysheva","22":"Angelina Golikova","23":"Marrit Leenstra","24":"Lee Bo-ra","25":"Denise Roth","26":"Yekaterina Aydova","27":"Qi Shuai","28":"Kim Hyunyung","29":"Yekaterina Lobysheva","30":"Park Seung-ju","31":"Vanessa Bittner","32":"Anastasia Bucsis","33":"Sugar Todd","34":"Yvonne Daldossi","35":"Zhang Shuang","36":"Marsha Hudey","37":"Danielle Wotherspoon","38":"Gabriele Hirschbichler","39":"Judith Hesse","40":null,"41":"* Olga Fatkulina RUS was sanctioned by IOC for an anti-doping rule violation according to IOC Disciplinary Commissions desicion of November 24 2017.
